metadata.name: PerSquiggle
metadata.description:
PerSquiggle commemorates the iconic mural collaboration between SquiggleDAO, artist Dave "Persue" Ross, and frens.House. Featuring BunnyKitty and the Luck Dragons adorning Chromie Squiggle #3672, the IRL mural collaboration marks SquiggleDAO's first-ever commissioned mural and was completed during the ETH Denver conference on 02/18/22. Chromie Squiggle Artist and Art Blocks founder Erick "Snowfro" Calderon helped Persue complete the final touches on the mural. Any copyrights and/or trademarks of any characters and/or images used belong to Dave "Persue" Ross & Erick "Snowfro" Calderon.

As the holder of this ERC721 token, you are granted full NON-COMMERCIAL rights to this artwork.
